cmp: 匕 (an ancient type of spoon, dagger/ladle)
mng: (of a bird, animal or plant) female, keyhole, valley

exm.mng: female chicken crows at daybreak (idiom); a woman usurps authority, women meddle in politics, The female wears the trousers.
a black stallion or possibly a yellow mare (idiom); don't judge by outward appearance
